STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: エンチャント（クリーチャー）
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE )

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
La creatura incantata prende +4/+4, ha volare e attacco improvviso ed è un Angelo in aggiunta ai suoi altri tipi.
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +4/+4, Flugfähigkeit und Erstschlag und ist zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen auch ein Engel.
La créature enchantée gagne +4/+4, a le vol et l’initiative, et elle est un ange en plus de ses autres types.
La criatura encantada obtiene +4/+4, tiene las habilidades de volar y dañar primero y es un Ángel además de sus otros tipos.
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは＋４/＋４の修整を受けるとともに飛行と先制攻撃を持ち、それは他のタイプに加えて天使でもある。
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
Зачарованное существо получает +4/+4, имеет Полет и Первый удар и является Ангелом в дополнение к своим другим типам.
A criatura encantada recebe +4/+4, tem voar e iniciativa e é um Anjo além de seus outros tipos.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Power_Add( 4 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Toughness_Add( 4 ) end
local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FLYING, 1 ) end
local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FIRST_STRIKE, 1 ) end
local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():SubType_GetWritable(parent):Add( CREATURE_TYPE_ANGEL, parent ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner’s hand.
Quando la creatura incantata muore, fai tornare il Destino Angelico in mano al suo proprietario.
Wenn die verzauberte Kreatur stirbt, bringe das Engelsschicksal auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
Quand la créature enchantée meurt, renvoyez la Destinée angélique dans la main de son propriétaire.
Cuando la criatura encantada muera, regresa el Destino angélico a la mano de su propietario.
エンチャントされているクリーチャーが死亡したとき、天使の運命をオーナーの手札に戻す。
When enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner’s hand.
Когда зачарованное существо умирает, верните Судьбу Ангела в руку ее владельца.
Quando a criatura encantada morrer, devolva Destino Angelical para a mão de seu dono.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if Object():GetZone() == ZONE_GRAVEYARD then Object():GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_HAND ) Object():PutInHand() end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then Object():Enchant( target_card ) end
